titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to increase the per resident payment floor for direct graduate medical education payments under the Medicare program.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR 3/14/2008 S2157-2159)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
3/13/2008--Introduced.
Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to increase, between FY2008 and FY2011, from 85% to 100% of the locality adjusted national average per resident amount the payment floor for direct graduate medical education (GME) payments under the Medicare program.
